data.name: Rawon
data.description: A rich beef soup flavored with keluak (black nut) for its distinctive dark color and unique taste.

data.name: Coto Makassar
data.description: his hearty beef soup is renowned for its rich and savory flavors, achieved through a blend of exotic spices and ground peanuts. The dish is uniquely flavored with keluak (black nut), which imparts a distinctive dark color and earthy taste to the broth.

data.name: Rendang
data.description: A slow-cooked dry curry made with beef simmered in coconut milk and a mixture of lemongrass, galangal, garlic, turmeric, ginger, and chilies.

data.name: Sate Ayam
data.description: Grilled chicken skewers served with a savory peanut sauce.

data.name: Nasi Goreng
data.description: Indonesian-style fried rice typically cooked with sweet soy sauce, garlic, shallots, and accompanied by a fried egg.

data.name: Gado-Gado
data.description: A mixed vegetable salad drizzled with a rich peanut sauce dressing.

data.name: Soto Betawi
data.description: A creamy soup made with beef and offal, enriched with coconut milk or milk.

data.name: Bakso
data.description: Meatball soup commonly served with noodles, tofu, and boiled eggs.

data.name: Ayam Betutu
data.description: Spiced steamed or roasted chicken wrapped in banana leaves, infused with traditional Balinese spices.

data.name: Pempek
data.description: Deep-fried fish cakes made from ground fish and tapioca, served with a tangy vinegar-based sauce.

data.name: Nasi Padang
data.description: Steamed rice served with an array of pre-cooked dishes, including curries, rendang, and sambal.

data.name: Nasi Tumpeng
data.description: A ceremonial dish featuring cone-shaped yellow rice surrounded by assorted side dishes.

data.name: Gudeg
data.description: A sweet stew made from young jackfruit, slow-cooked with palm sugar and coconut milk.

data.name: Opor Ayam
data.description: Chicken cooked in a rich coconut milk sauce seasoned with lemongrass, galangal, and other spices.

data.name: Kerak Telor
data.description: A traditional Betawi omelette made from glutinous rice, eggs, and shredded coconut, cooked over charcoal.

data.name: Bubur Ayam
data.description: A savory chicken congee garnished with fried shallots, chopped scallions, and crispy crackers.
